# canInit(with:)

**Type Method**

Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver can initialize itself from the data on the specified pasteboard.

## Declaration

```swift
class func canInit(with pasteboard: NSPasteboard) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **pasteboard**: The pasteboard containing the image data.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the receiver understands the format of the specified data and can use it to initialize itself; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Discussion

This method invokes the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSImageRep/imageUnfilteredPasteboardTypes()] class method and checks the list of types returned by that method against the data types in `pasteboard`. If it finds a match, it returns [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true]. When creating a subclass of `NSImageRep` that accepts image data from a non-default pasteboard type, override the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSImageRep/imageUnfilteredPasteboardTypes()] method to assure this method returns the correct response.

## Determining Types for Images

- **canInit(with:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the image representation can initialize itself from the specified data.
- **imageTypes**: Returns an array of UTI strings identifying the image types supported by the image representation, either directly or through a user-installed filter service.
- **imageUnfilteredTypes**: Returns an array of UTI strings identifying the image types supported directly by the ime representation.
- **imageFileTypes()**: Returns the file types supported by the image representation class or one of its subclasses.
- **imagePasteboardTypes()**: Returns the pasteboard types supported by the image representation class or one of its subclasses.
- **imageUnfilteredFileTypes()**: Returns the list of file types supported directly by the image representation.
- **imageUnfilteredPasteboardTypes()**: Returns the list of pasteboard types supported directly by the image representation.
